title: Device Disconnected
description: Fired when a physical device is unpaired or disconnected.

deviceId.description: The unique identifier of the disconnected device.

deviceName.description: The human-readable name of the device.

deviceType.description: The category of the disconnected device.

reason.description: The reason the device was disconnected.

sessionDurationSeconds.description: The duration in seconds the device was connected before disconnecting.
